comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.histopolis.com/Grave/Detail.aspx?GraveID=359238762 suggests he was buried in nearby New Jersey. Fort Delaware is on a small island in the Delaware River; the eastern bank of the river is New Jersey.

comment.author: 69761983@N03
comment._content: What a handsome young man. It is a shame there weren't photos taken of ALL the enlisted soldiers - on both sides.

comment.author: 90429191@N08
comment._content: This is my Great Great Grandfather!... thanks so much for the person who found this photo and posted it with the library of Congress. It means so much to me to see it, and to share with my family...Brenda Wilhelm
